Detailed Description

Function to get frame from POBEYE.

  • To get a frame from the camera, call one of these functions :
    1. GrabRGBFrame(),
    2. GrabRedFrame(),
    3. GrabGreenFrame() or
    4. GrabBlueFrame().
  • Next, get the frame with the function :
    1. GetPointerOnRGBFrame(),
    2. GetPointerOnRedBuffer(),
    3. GetPointerOnGreenBuffer() or
    4. GetPointerOnBlueBuffer().

  • To get Hue-Saturation-Light Frame, call the functions :
    1. GetPointerOnHSLFrame(),
    2. GrabRGBFrame(),
    3. GetHslFrame()

Note:
The frame is in POB-EYE memory. The memory contains the 3 components red,green and blue. This memory has a size of ~ 32 Kbytes ( 120 pixels per 88 per component ).

The HSL Frame share the same memory array that the RGB frame.

Warning:
The POB-EYE module have 64 Kbytes of RAM and uses 32 Kbytes for own usage. You have for your program only 32 Kbytes .
See also:
visio.h
Author:
Pierre SEGUIN. POB-Technology
